summary: Moves the entity to a new position.

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: The x coordinate to move the entity to.

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: The y coordinate to move the entity to.

parameters.name: duration
parameters.description: **Optional:** the time in milliseconds that it should take for the entity to reach its destination; or ```0``` / ```undefined``` to have an instant movement.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: **Optional:** the function to be called when the entity has finished moving to its new position.

platforms.names: Google Chrome, Mozilla FireFox, Internet Explorer 9+, Opera, Safari.
